DESCRIPTION: Id cards are automatically used when drawn regardless of Energy.
Whenever an enemy dies, heal HP equal to its Terror.
Whenever you gain #b15 Ephemeral, gain #b1 Intangible.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Whenever a mind controlled enemy deals damage or applies a debuff, a random enemy receives it instead. Whenever it applies a buff, gains Block, or heals HP, you receive it instead.
A relic that allows you to view your draw pile in order.
Stunned enemies do nothing on their turn.
Constricted enemies take damage at the end of their turn.
